https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gacRv2RRysKEKvDCsbGa94pm5UT.jpg Set in a rural Québec village in the dead of winter, Jean-François, a single father, works at a deserted bowling alley at night and in a rundown motel during the day. His daughter, Julyvonne never leaves their home. Jean-François isolates her in fear that contact with the outside world will scar her the way it has him. Curling
